headline: CB Raises Dividend, Okays Buyback: Is the Stock a Buy Now?
summary: Chubb's sufficient cash-generation capabilities, backed by sustained operational excellence, should continue to support wealth distribution to shareholders.

raw.headline: CB Raises Dividend, Okays Buyback: Is the Stock a Buy Now?

headline: Tim Boroughs Named Vice Chairman, Chubb Group and Executive Chairman, Asset Management; Chris Hogan Succeeds Boroughs as Chubb Group Chief Investment Officer
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE: CB) announced today that Tim Boroughs has been named Vice Chairman, Chubb Group and Executive Chairman, Asset Management. Chris Hogan has been promoted to Senior Vice President, Chubb Group and Chief Investment Officer, reporting to Tim.
